div.p: Brownstown schools will again be distributing Remote Learning packets on Wednesday, April 8 during three time windows; 7-9 am, 11am-1pm, and 4-6 pm. Students can also...

img.alt: Grab and Go Lunches and Packets not Picked Up

a.span: Grab and Go Lunches and Packets not Picked Up

div.p: Just a reminder Grab and Go lunches will be distributed out again tomorrow, April 16, 2020 8:00-10:30am along with any packets that were not picked up last week.
